name: lancache-/monolithic
description: This docker container provides a caching proxy server for game download content. For any network with more than one PC gamer in connected this will drastically reduce internet bandwidth consumption.

variables.name: Cache size
variables.description: The max amount of disk space the container should use for caching data

variables.name: Cacge index size
variables.description: Amount of index memory for the nginx cache manager. We recommend 250m of index memory per 1TB of CACHE_DISK_SIZE

variables.name: Max Cache age
variables.description: The maximum amount of time a file should be held in cache. There is usually no reason to reduce this - the cache will automatically remove the oldest content if it needs the space.
